content.html: I'm starting to realise that if I had not contributed to OSS, my leadership/people skills would not have had a chance to grow as much. And while OSS throws new curveballs everyday, I'm actually grateful because each one of them is a learning experience in itself ðŸ’›
content.value:
I'm starting to realise that if I had not contributed to OSS, my leadership/people skills would not have had a chance to grow as much.

And while OSS throws new curveballs everyday, I'm actually grateful because each one of them is a learning experience in itself ðŸ’›
